sourcesContent:
import { Input ,Form,FormGroup,Label,Button,FormText, Card } from "reactstrap";
import { useState } from "react";






export function FormComponent(params) {
const [displayPart1, setdisplay1] = useState("d-block"); 
const [displayPart2, setdisplay2] = useState("d-none"); 
const [emailStatus, setemailStatus] = useState(false);
const [emailValidation, setemailValidation] = useState(initialState);


function Next() {
  if (emailStatus) {
    
  }
}

function EmailValidation(event) {
  setemailStatus(event.target.checkValidity())
  
}

    return(
        
    <Form className="m-auto" style={{width :'400px'}}>
  <FormGroup className={displayPart1} >
  <FormGroup >
    <Label for="exampleEmail">
      Nom
    </Label>
    <Input 
      id="exampleEmail"
      name="email"
      placeholder="with a placeholder"
      type="email"
    />
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup>
    <Label for="exampleEmail">
      Prenom
    </Label>
    <Input 
      id="exampleEmail"
      name="email"
      placeholder="with a placeholder"
      type="email"
    />
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup >
    <Label for="exampleEmail">
      Email
    </Label>
    <Input 
      id="exampleEmail"
      name="email"
      placeholder="with a placeholder"
      type="email"
      onChange={data=>EmailValidation(data)}
    />
  </FormGroup>
  
  <FormGroup>
    <Label for="examplePassword">
      Mot de passe
    </Label>
    <Input
      id="examplePassword"
      name="password"
      placeholder="password placeholder"
      type="password"
    />
  </FormGroup>
  
  <Button onClick={()=>{setdisplay1('d-none');setdisplay2('d-block')}}>
    Next
  </Button>
  </FormGroup>





<FormGroup className={displayPart2}>
<FormGroup>
    <Label for="exampleFile">
      Image
    </Label>
    <Input
      id="exampleFile"
      name="file"
      type="file"
    />
    <FormText>
      This is some placeholder block-level help text for the above input. It's a bit lighter and easily wraps to a new line.
    </FormText>
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup>
    <Label for="exampleSelect">
      Sex
    </Label>
    <Input
      id="exampleSelect"
      name="select"
      type="select"
    >
      <option>
      FÃ©minin
      </option>
      <option>
      Masculin
      </option>
    </Input>
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup>
    <Label for="exampleEmail">
      Adresse
    </Label>
    <Input 
      id="exampleEmail"
      name="email"
      placeholder="with a placeholder"
      type="email"
    />
  </FormGroup>
 
  <FormGroup>
    <Label for="exampleDate">
      Date de naissance
    </Label>
    <Input
      id="exampleDate"
      name="date"
      placeholder="date placeholder"
      type="date"
    />
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup tag="fieldset">
  <Label >
        HOBBIES
    </Label>
  <FormGroup check >
    <Input type="checkbox" />
    {' '}
    <Label check>
       Sport
    </Label>
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup check >
    <Input type="checkbox" />
    <Label check>
       Ecritue
    </Label>
  </FormGroup>
  <FormGroup check >
    <Input type="checkbox" />
    <Label check>
       Voyage
    </Label>
  </FormGroup>
  </FormGroup>
  <Button onClick={()=>{setdisplay2('d-none');setdisplay1('d-block')}}>
    Previous
  </Button>
  <Button className="mx-5">
    Submit
  </Button>  
  </FormGroup>
</Form>


           
    );
    
}
